entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 06:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
